Control Name: Communicates Remediation Activities—Remediation activities are documented and communicated in accordance with the incident response program.

control_attributes.Control: Communicates Remediation Activities—Remediation activities are documented and communicated in accordance with the incident response program.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.4 The entity responds to identified security incidents by executing a defined incident response program to understand, contain, remediate, and communicate security incidents, as appropriate.
